resources.string: Start scenario
input parameters with spaces ex)a b c

communicate with test server.
 input parameters 
 [read type] [trade type] [installment] [serviceCharge] [tax] [totalCharge]
 read type : add all you want. MSR(1), EMV(2), RFID(4), Barcode(8), PIN Pad(16), All(31) 
 trade type : card(10)/cash(21)
 installment : card(00~12), cash:(personal:01, business:02)
 serviceCharge, tax, totalCharge : max 12 number

communicate with test server.
 input parameters with space
 [read type] [trade type] [installment] [service charge] [tax] [total charge] [approval number] [approval date] [trade number]
 read type : add all you want. MSR(1), EMV(2), RFID(4), Barcode(8), PIN Pad(16), All(31) 
 trade type : network revoke(card:10, cash:25)/force revoke(card:30, cash:21)
 installment : card(00~12), cash:(personal:01, business:02)
 service charge, tax, totalCharge : max 12 number
 approval number : 8~12 number
 approval date : 6 number (year, month, date)
 trade number : card(12 number), cash(reason : "CASH" + [ 1 : cancel, 2 : error, 3 : etc])

input parameters with space
 [Van ID] [CAT ID] [Group ID] [Device ID] [DIK] [PMK] [Place ID] [Machine ID] [Sign Threshold]
 Van ID : 2 number, CAT ID : 10 number, Group ID : 2 number, Device ID : 5 number, DIK : 48 character, PMK : 44 character , Place ID : 20 character or less, Machine ID : 20 character or less, Sign Threshold : variable
input parameters with space\n [NICE PGP server IP] [NICE PGP server port] [NICE SSL server IP] [NICE SSL server port]\n
input parameters with space\n [Company Registration Number]\n Company Registration Number : 10 number
input parameters with space\n [Server IP] [Server port]\n

input parameter
 [date] 
 date : yyyyMMddHHmmss ex)20160108150905
input parameter\n [Amount] \n

input parameter
 [Log index] 
 Log index : purchase(0~3), recharge(4~7), refund(8~11), recent(12 ~ 255)

input parameters with space
 [Default Key] [Authentication Key] [Place ID] [Terminal ID] [Balance limit]
 Default Key : 16 character, Authentication Key : 12 character (6 hex), Place ID : 16 character, Terminal ID : 16 character, Balance limit : variable 
"

input parameters with space
 [AP SSID] [AP Password] [IP] [Subnet] [Gateway] [DNS] [DHCP Enable] [Timeout] [Module Type]
 DHcp Enable : Disable(0), Enable(1)
 Module type : WIFI(1), Ethernet(2), LTE(3)
input parameter\n [Mode]\n
input parameters with space\n [Main hardware revision] [Sub hardware1 revision] [Sub hardware2 revision] [Sub hardware3 revision]\n
input parameter\n [Serial number]\n
input parameters with space\n [Server IP] [Server port]]\n

input parameters with space
 [CAT ID] [Place ID] [Machine ID]
 CAT ID : 10 number, Place ID : 20 character or less, Machine ID : 20 character or less

input parameters with space\n [Tax included] [Service charge] [Unit price] [Charge Step] [Default Step Index] [Step Multipliers]\n Tax included : Yes(1), No(0)\m Service charge, Unit price : numbers\m Charge Step : numbers (1~20)\m Default Step Index : numbers (0~19)\m Step Multipliers : numbers (1,2,5,7,10,...)\m

input parameters with space
 [Cycle] [Low time] [Interval] [Pulse value] [Pulse count per bill]
 Cycle, Low time, Interval : ms
 Pulse value : 500 KRW(0), 1000 KRW(1)
 Pulse count per bill : 3 numbers. (1k, 5k, 10k ) krw
